title: #103 - More Stabbings Than Medals - The Daringness of Matti Nykanen
description:
This week, we look at one of the most self destructive, maniacal & absolutely disastrous human beings that has ever existed in the world of sports crime. He was practically a God in his country for his Olympic heroics, then he devolved into domestic violence, drunk brawls, stripping, releasing pop albums, and not being able to stop stabbing everyone around him. He's wild, crazy, and so, so much fun!
Get a job on a celebrity phone sex line, get yourself on a postage stamp in a foreign dictatorship, and stab a close friend over a game of "pull my finger" with Matti Nykanen!!
Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!!
Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman
